sentences.en: The ability of intercepting and tracking for air defense antimissile system can be effectively improved by top observation with aerostat.
sentences.cn: 利用浮空器进行俯视观测可有效提高防空反导系统的截获、跟踪目标能力。

sentences.en: The Air Force intends to integrate the aerostat radars with the three Airborne Warning and Control System AWACS being purchased from Israel.
sentences.cn: 空军打算把该高空气球的雷达和三架拥有机载预警和控制系统的预警机（AWACS）综合起来，目前AWACS正在从以色列购买。

sentences.en: To stability analysis of tethered balloon, a three dimensional nonlinear mathematical model tethered aerostat was assembled.
sentences.cn: 为研究系留气球稳定性,建立了系留气球的三维非线性动力学模型.

sentences.en: Transient thermal response of a spherical aerostat in rising process was studied based on this model.
sentences.cn: 通过建立平流层浮空器的热模型，对球形浮空器升空过程中的瞬态热响应进行了数值模拟。

trans.tran_en: a lighter-than-air craft, such as a balloon
